doc:
Susan Tolsky https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_Tolsky 0 Susan Tolsky (born April 6, 1943 in Houston, Texas) is an American actress and voice actress, perhaps best known for her role as Biddie Cloom on the comedy Western series Here Come the Brides (1968–70) and Bernadette on Madame's Place (1982–83). As a voice actress, Tolsky was part of the main cast on Disney Channel's The Buzz on Maggie (2005–06), and had recurring roles on Aladdin, Darkwing Duck, Foofur, and Pepper Ann. Susan_Tolsky ( born April_6_,_1943 in Houston , Texas ) is an_American_actress_and_voice_actress , perhaps_best_known for her_role as Biddie_Cloom on the_comedy_Western_series Here Come the_Brides ( 1968 – 70 ) and_Bernadette on Madame 's_Place ( 1982 – 83 ) . As a_voice_actress , Tolsky was part of the_main_cast on Disney_Channel 's The Buzz on Maggie_(_2005 – 06_) , and had_recurring roles on Aladdin , Darkwing_Duck , Foofur , and Pepper_Ann .
